text: @PressSec Your boss Individual 1 is responsible for Uncle Cain's death...Ask Individual 1 why has he held rallies and pretended like this isn't real. Why hasn't the Individual 1 admit he is to blame for the massive spread of covid-19 due to his xenophobic denials its fault China.
